column4: Any chance somebody could help me? My computer froze while installing cedega, and now I can't open package manager because it says I need to reinstall cedega, trying to run the cedega package tells me it may be corrupt or I am not allowed to run it, and trying to remove it through aptitude tells me I need to reinstall it first.
Heh, well I'd at least like to get it to work, or at the VERY least be able to use package manager again
What is the etiquette in here? If I don't get an answer to my question do I just repeat it every 5 minutes?
